Variable.Name: zigbee:InstantaneousDemand
Variable.Description: Instantaneous Demand

Variable.Name: zigbee:Multiplier
Variable.Description: Multiplier applied to demand and summation values

Variable.Name: zigbee:Divisor
Variable.Description: Divisor applied to demand and summation values

Variable.Name: zigbee:CurrentSummationDelivered
Variable.Description: Summation Delivered to Home

Variable.Name: zigbee:CurrentSummationReceived
Variable.Description: Summation Received from Home

Variable.Name: zigbee:Price
Variable.Description: Price of electricity

Variable.Name: zigbee:TrailingDigits
Variable.Description: Indicates the number of digits to the right of the decimal point

Variable.Name: zigbee:RateLabel
Variable.Description: Active priuce rate label

Variable.Name: zigbee:Currency
Variable.Description: The local unit of currency used in the price field

Variable.Name: zigbee:PriceTier
Variable.Description: The current Price Tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:PriceStartTime
Variable.Description: The time at which the price signal becomes valid

Variable.Name: zigbee:PriceDuration
Variable.Description: Amount of time in minutes after the Start Time during which the price signal is valid

Variable.Name: zigbee:Message
Variable.Description: Message from utility to customer

Variable.Name: zigbee:MessageId
Variable.Description: Message unique ID

Variable.Name: zigbee:MessageStartTime
Variable.Description: Start time for current message

Variable.Name: zigbee:MessageDurationInMinutes
Variable.Description: Start time for current message

Variable.Name: zigbee:MessagePriority
Variable.Description: Message priority

Variable.Name: zigbee:MessageConfirmationRequired
Variable.Description: Indicates if the message requires user confirmation

Variable.Name: zigbee:MessageConfirmed
Variable.Description: Indicates if the message has received user confirmation

Variable.Name: zigbee:BlockPeriodConsumption
Variable.Description: The most recent summed value of Energy, Gas or Water delivered and consumed in the premises during the Block Tariff Period

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block1Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block2Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block3Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block4Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block5Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block6Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block7Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block8Price
Variable.Description: The price of Energy, Gas, or Water delivered to the premises at a specific price tier

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block1Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block2Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block3Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block4Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block5Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block6Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block7Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:Block8Threshold
Variable.Description: the block threshold values for a given period (typically the billing cycle)

Variable.Name: zigbee:BlockPeriodStart
Variable.Description: The start time of the current block tariff period

Variable.Name: zigbee:BlockPeriodDuration
Variable.Description: The current block tariff period duration in minutes

Variable.Name: zigbee:BlockThresholdMultiplier
Variable.Description: Provides a value to be multiplied against Threshold attributes

Variable.Name: zigbee:BlockThresholdDivisor
Variable.Description: Provides a value to divide the result of applying the threshold multiplier attribute to Block Threshold values

Variable.Name: zigbee:BillingPeriodStart
Variable.Description: The start time of the current billing period

Variable.Name: zigbee:BillingPeriodDuration
Variable.Description: The current billing period duration in minutes
